biotools.summary:
an R/bioconductor-based framework for standardised metabolomics data analysis and beyond.
Quality Control Report for Mass Spectrometry (QCRMS)-based Metabolomics experiments.

Statistics in R Using Class-based Templates.

Defines and includes a set of class-based templates for developing and implementing data processing and analysis workflows, with a strong emphasis on statistics and machine learning.

Data processing & analysis tools for Metabolomics and other omics.

An extensive set of data (pre-)processing and analysis methods and tools for metabolomics and other omics, with a strong emphasis on statistics and machine learning.
